channel.title: Money/coins isn't dissappearing when i buy items, but i get the item still :P
channel.description: when u buy items in my pserver, delta 317, demise pking source and client, money doesnt dissappear but you get the item. it doesnt matter if you're an owner, admin, or a regular player, it just doesn't dissappear. how can i fix this?

item.title: Money/coins isn't dissappearing when i buy items, but i get the item still :P
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:6, topic:374683”]Look carefully, we are deleting the money!

deleteItem(995, TotPrice2);

deleteItem(playerItemsN[Slot2], TotPrice2);

The code is there for you to compare…[/quote]

youre a life saver no cheating in the rsps now lol love you no homo

item.source: Money/coins isn't dissappearing when i buy items, but i get the item still :P

item.title: Money/coins isn't dissappearing when i buy items, but i get the item still :P
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

I have played about with demise pking… the problem is he (demise) had edited the part where it removes coins/points etc because he wanted it so kills don’t go down, etc…

to fix this you must first search client.java for:

public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {

You should find this method:

[code=java]public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
if (amount > 0
&& itemID
== (server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] - 1)) {
if (amount > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot]) {
amount = server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot];
}
double ShopValue;
double TotPrice;
int TotPrice2;
int Overstock;
int Slot = 0;
int Slot2 = 0;
int Slot3 = 0;
int Slot4 = 0;
int PointPk;
if (amount > 100) {
TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot))*amount;
Slot = GetItemSlot(995);
if (Slot == -1 && TotPrice2 != 0) {
sM(“You don’t have enough coins.”);
}
if(TotPrice2 <= 1) {
TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
}
if (TotPrice2 <= 0) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
addItem(itemID, amount);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
}
} else if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
addItem(itemID, amount);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= amount;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
}
} else {
sM(“You don’t have enough coins.”);
}
}else{

        for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) {
            TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
			PointPk = getpkpvalue(itemID); 
            Slot = GetItemSlot(995);
            Slot2 = GetItemSlot(6529);
            if (Slot == -1 && MyShopID != 15 && MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 19 && MyShopID != 1 && MyShopID != 20) {
                sM("You don't have enough coins.");
                break;
            }
            if (Slot2 == -1 && MyShopID == 8) {
                sM("You don't have enough tokkul.");
                break;
            }

if (Slot3 == -1 && MyShopID == 20) {
sM(“You don’t have enough points.”);
break;
}
if (Slot3 == -1 && MyShopID == 15) {
sM(“You don’t have enough points.”);
break;
}
if (PointPk == -1 && MyShopID == 1) {
sM(“You need more kills to buy that item!”);
break;
}

            if (MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 15 && MyShopID !=1 && MyShopID !=20) {
                if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {
                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }

                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("Not enough coins for this item.");
					break;
                }
            }
			if (MyShopID == 1 || MyShopID == 20) {
                if (Wins >= PointPk) {
                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
						updateText();
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("You don't have enough kills to buy/wear that!");
					break;
                }
            }						
            if (MyShopID == 8) {
                if (playerItemsN[Slot2] >= TotPrice2) {
                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("Not enough tokkul for this item.");
					break;
                }
            }
            if (MyShopID == 15) {
                if (Wins >= TotPrice2) {
                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
						updateText();
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("Not enough points for this item.");
					break;
                }
            }				
        }

}
resetItems(3823);
resetShop(MyShopID);
UpdatePlayerShop();
return true;
}
return false;
}[/code]

Replace that with this one, which is makes it so money is taken when you buy stuff…

[code=java] public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
if (amount > 0
&& itemID
== (server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] - 1)) {
if (amount > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot]) {
amount = server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot];
}
double ShopValue;
double TotPrice;
int TotPrice2;
int Overstock;
int Slot = 0;
int Slot2 = 0;
int Slot3 = 0;
int Slot4 = 0;
int PointPk;
if (amount > 100) {
TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot))*amount;
Slot = GetItemSlot(995);
if (Slot == -1 && TotPrice2 != 0) {
sM(“You don’t have enough coins.”);
}
if(TotPrice2 <= 1) {
TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
}
if (TotPrice2 <= 0) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
addItem(itemID, amount);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
}
} else if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
addItem(itemID, amount);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= amount;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
}
} else {
sM(“You don’t have enough coins.”);
}
}else{

        for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) {
            TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
			PointPk = getpkpvalue(itemID); 
            Slot = GetItemSlot(995);
            Slot2 = GetItemSlot(6529);
            if (Slot == -1 && MyShopID != 15 && MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 19 && MyShopID != 1 && MyShopID != 20) {
                sM("You don't have enough coins.");
                break;
            }
            if (Slot2 == -1 && MyShopID == 8) {
                sM("You don't have enough tokkul.");
                break;
            }

if (Slot3 == -1 && MyShopID == 20) {
sM(“You don’t have enough points.”);
break;
}
if (Slot3 == -1 && MyShopID == 15) {
sM(“You don’t have enough points.”);
break;
}
if (PointPk == -1 && MyShopID == 1) {
sM(“You need more kills to buy that item!”);
break;
}

            if (MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 15 && MyShopID !=1 && MyShopID !=20) {
                if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {
                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
						deleteItem(995, TotPrice2);
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }

                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("Not enough coins for this item.");
					break;
                }
            }
			if (MyShopID == 1 || MyShopID == 20) {
                if (Wins >= PointPk) {
                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
						updateText();
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
						Wins -= PointPk;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("You don't have enough kills to buy/wear that!");
					break;
                }
            }						
            if (MyShopID == 8) {
                if (playerItemsN[Slot2] >= TotPrice2) {
                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
						deleteItem(playerItemsN[Slot2], TotPrice2);
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("Not enough tokkul for this item.");
					break;
                }
            }
            if (MyShopID == 15) {
                if (Wins >= TotPrice2) {
                    if (freeSlots() > 0) {
						updateText();
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
						Wins -= TotPrice2;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("Not enough points for this item.");
					break;
                }
            }				
        }

}
resetItems(3823);
resetShop(MyShopID);
UpdatePlayerShop();
return true;
}
return false;
}[/code]

It should work seen as I have tested it on that very source, but make a backup first just in case (get used to doing that). And if you feel like it, study the improved code to see what was changed…

Read full topic

item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

that’s in my client.java, but im looking at it again. lemme see and ill modify this post in a couple minutes.

EDIT: i still dont get it, ive tried alot of options. it just doesn’t take away my money but still gives me the items

still nothing

item.source: Money/coins isn't dissappearing when i buy items, but i get the item still :P

item.title: Money/coins isn't dissappearing when i buy items, but i get the item still :P
item.dc:creator: @Bandos_K0 Bandos K0
item.description:
@Bandos_K0 wrote:

for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) {
			TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 1, fromSlot));
			if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0 || c.getItems().playerHasItem(995)) {
				if (Item.itemIsNote[itemID] == false) {
					c.getItems().deleteItem(itemID, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemID), 1);
				} else {
					c.getItems().deleteItem(itemID, fromSlot, 1);
				}
				c.getItems().addItem(995, TotPrice2);
				addShopItem(itemID, 1);
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory.");
				break;
			}
		}
		c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
		resetShop(c.myShopId);
		updatePlayerShop();
		return true;
	}
	return true;
}

try this is the SHOP ASSISTANT file
